Detailed Description

This header defines miscellaneous GTI APIs.

Function Documentation

GTI_EXPORT GTI_RETURN_TYPE GTI_DISABLE_RTDX ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid )

GTI_DISABLE_RTDX() - Disable RTDX feature.

This function is used to disable the RTDX feature which supplies a communication channel over JTAG between an application running on the target and the client on the PC host.

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
GTI_EXPORT GTI_RETURN_TYPE GTI_ENABLE_RTDX ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid )

GTI_ENABLE_RTDX() - Enable RTDX feature.

This function is used to enable the RTDX feature which supplies a communication channel over JTAG between an application running on the target and the client on the PC host.

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
GTI_EXPORT GTI_RETURN_TYPE GTI_GET_CONTEXT_CONST ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid,
GTI_STRING_TYPE  cName,
GTI_UINT32_TYPE *  pContainer 
)

GTI_GET_CONTEXT_CONST() - Get an integer constant value.

This function is used to retrieve an integer constant value that is specific to the driver or device being used. Use cName to specify by text name the constant to retrieve.

Note: currently this call is only supported by the C64x+ driver, and only for the constant named "UINT32_CONST_EXEC_PACKET_INFO_ARRSIZE". See GTI_GET_EXEC_PACKET_INFO() for how this constant is used.

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
[in]cNameName of constant to get.
[out]pContainerPointer to return constant value.
GTI_EXPORT GTI_RETURN_TYPE GTI_GET_EXEC_PACKET_INFO ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid,
GTI_EXEC_PACKET_INFO *  pExecPacketInfo 
)

GTI_GET_EXEC_PACKET_INFO() - Get execute packet information.

This function is used to retrieve information on the instructions that are to begin execution on the next architectural cycle. This function differs from a simple PC register read in that it handles sets of instructions executing in parallel. This function will also return the length of each individual execute packet.

The GTI_EXEC_PACKET_INFO structure contains an array of structures that supports the return of execute packet information. The client is responsible for allocating this array. Call GTI_GET_CONTEXT_CONST() with cName set to "UINT32_CONST_EXEC_PACKET_INFO_ARRSIZE" to retrieve the length of the pExecPackets array that should be allocated for the GTI_EXEC_PACKET_INFO structure.

Note: currently this call is only supported by the C64x+ driver.

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
[out]pExecPacketInfoPointer to return execute packet list.
